# Probo

> Probo is an open-source compliance automation platform that helps companies achieve SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, HIPAA, and other security certifications with expert guidance and done-for-you services. Backed by Y Combinator (W25).

## Why Probo?

Unlike traditional compliance platforms that give you software and leave you to figure it out, Probo provides:

- **Expert-Led Service**: Dedicated compliance officers manage your program end-to-end
- **Open Source**: Self-host with no vendor lock-in (https://github.com/getprobo/probo)
- **Fast Results**: SOC 2 Type 1 in 4-6 week, ISO 27001 in 3 months
- **Cost-Effective**: 70-80% cost reduction vs traditional Big 4 consultants
- **Slack-Native**: Access documents, trigger workflows, and talk to your compliance officer without leaving Slack
- **Trust Page**: Share a branded page that proves your compliance status to prospects

## How Probo Works

1. **Onboarding**: We understand your business, tech stack, and compliance goals
2. **ISMS Design**: We document how your company already works and build compliant processes around it
3. **Automation**: Evidence collection, policy updates, and approvals run in the background
4. **Expert Management**: Your dedicated compliance officer handles auditor coordination, risk assessments, and remediation
5. **Continuous Compliance**: Stay audit-ready year-round, not just during audit season

## Core Pages

- [Homepage](https://getprobo.com) - Overview of compliance automation services
- [Documentation](https://getprobo.com/docs) - Self-hosting and API guides
- [Blog](https://getprobo.com/blog) - Compliance insights and guides and FAQ
- [Customer Stories](https://getprobo.com/stories) - Case studies from real customers
- [About](https://getprobo.com/about) - Team and mission

## Supported Compliance Frameworks

| Framework | Type | Use Case |
|-----------|------|----------|
| SOC 2 Type 1 | Attestation | Point-in-time security controls assessment, first step for startups |
| SOC 2 Type 2 | Attestation | Controls effectiveness over 3-12 months, required by enterprise customers |
| SOC 3 | Attestation | Public-facing version of SOC 2 |
| ISO 27001 | Certification | Information security management system, common in EU/international deals |
| ISO 27701 | Certification | Privacy information management, extension of ISO 27001 |
| ISO 42001 | Certification | AI management system, for companies building AI products |
| GDPR | Regulation | EU data protection compliance |
| HIPAA | Regulation | US healthcare data protection |
| CCPA | Regulation | California consumer privacy |
| FERPA | Regulation | US education data protection |
| CASA | Framework | Cloud Application Security Assessment |
| NIS2 | Regulation | EU network and information security |
| DORA | Regulation | EU digital operational resilience for financial services |

## Blog & Thought Leadership

### Understanding Compliance Frameworks
- [What is SOC 2 and how to be compliant?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-28-what-is-soc2) - Comprehensive guide to SOC 2 attestation vs certification
- [SOC 2 or ISO 27001: Which should you choose?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-08-soc2-or-iso27001) - Framework comparison for different markets

### Timeline & Cost
- [What is the cost of SOC 2?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-03-04-what-is-soc2-cost) - Pricing breakdown for SOC 2 compliance
- [How long does SOC 2 take?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-09-how-long-for-soc2) - Timeline expectations for Type 1 and Type 2
- [How long does ISO 27001 take?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-12-how-long-for-iso27001) - Certification timeline guide

### Compliance Strategy
- [What are the steps toward compliance?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-09-11-what-are-the-steps-toward-compliance) - Step-by-step compliance roadmap
- [What is hands-off compliance?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-17-what-is-hands-off-compliance) - The done-for-you approach explained
- [The case for open source compliance](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-02-04-the-case-for-open-source-compliance) - Why open source matters in GRC
- [Why one-size-fits-all solutions like Vanta aren't ideal](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-02-17-why-a-one-size-fit-all-solution-like-vanta-is-not-ideal) - Limitations of generic compliance platforms

### Technical Requirements
- [Do you need a penetration test for SOC 2?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-19-do-you-need-pen-test-for-soc2) - Pen testing requirements explained
- [Do you need a penetration test for ISO 27001?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-10-23-do-you-need-pen-test-for-iso27001) - ISO 27001 pen test guidance
- [Do you need code reviews for compliance?](https://www.getprobo.com/blog/2025-11-09-do-you-need-code-reviews) - Code review requirements

## Customer Success Stories

### Ahrefs - ISO 27001 in 3 Months
Ahrefs, the $100M ARR SEO platform with 3,600+ servers and 500+ PB of data, achieved ISO 27001 certification in 13 weeks (80% faster than traditional approaches) with 70-80% cost savings vs Big 4 consultants.
[Read the full story](https://www.getprobo.com/stories/ahrefs-iso)

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: Is Probo open source?**
A: Yes, Probo's core platform is fully open source under a permissive license. You can self-host it or use our managed service with expert compliance officers.

**Q: How fast can I get SOC 2?**
A: With Probo, SOC 2 Type 1 can be achieved in 4-6 weeks. Type 2 adds a 3-12 month observation period on top of that.

**Q: How fast can I get ISO 27001?**
A: ISO 27001 certification typically takes 3-4 months with Probo, compared to 6-12 months with traditional approaches.

**Q: What makes Probo different from Vanta, Drata, or Secureframe?**
A: Three key differences: (1) Probo is open source with no vendor lock-in, (2) We provide done-for-you services with dedicated compliance officers rather than just software, (3) We focus on making compliance fit your existing workflows rather than forcing you into templates.

**Q: Do I need technical expertise to use Probo?**
A: No. Our compliance officers handle the technical implementation. Your team only gets involved when genuine input is needed.

**Q: What if I'm not ready for SOC 2 yet?**
A: That's fine. We help you assess readiness and can start with security fundamentals before pursuing formal certification.
